title: Dr. Fauci, World Series, R. Kelly, Rev. Motown and more.
itunes:title: Dr. Fauci, World Series, R. Kelly, Rev. Motown and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Big Dog talks about his absentee ballot. The Chief Love Officer describes the different grades of chewing for a woman who is dealing with a savage. R. Kelly got beat up in jail and the guards did nothing. Biden and Harris shine on Trump Tower in Chicago. Pastor Motown has a specific message just for 45 that will have you runnin' ten miles! Are scented masks a bit much or nah? Game 1 of The World Series is tonight between LA and Tampa Bay. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve explains the difference between hate and love.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
